Description:
See what commands are being input into the device by other people, full credentials can be in the history

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Show Commands Input
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%show history%' or log like '%show history all%' or log like '%show logging%')
